headline: Slowing AI adoption could leave market, economy vulnerable
summary: Apollo Global Management Partner and chief economist Torsten Sløk explains to Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman how the slowdown in the AI adoption could end up weighing heavily on the market (^DJI, ^IXIC, ^GSPC). Also catch Torsten Sløk explain the economic data he is looking at after the US government shutdown delayed the release of the September jobs report. Note: Apollo Global Management is the parent company of Yahoo Finance. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

content.title: Slowing AI adoption could leave market, economy vulnerable
content.description:

Also catch Torsten Sløk explain the economic data he is looking at after the US government shutdown delayed the release of the September jobs report.

Note: Apollo Global Management is the parent company of Yahoo Finance.
